name: CALME ET SPACIEUX APPART A L’HIVERNAGE MARRAKECH
description:
Located in Marrakech, 1.5 km from Djemaa El Fna and 1.6 km from Mouassine Museum, CALME ET SPACIEUX APPART A L’HIVERNAGE MARRAKECH provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This apartment also features a private pool. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Koutoubia Mosque.

The apartment is composed of 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 3 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Majorelle Gardens, Le Jardin Secret and Yves Saint Laurent Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 4 km from CALME ET SPACIEUX APPART A L’HIVERNAGE MARRAKECH.

address.full: Rue El Mahjoub Ermiza, 40000 Marrakech, Morocco

name: Appartement dans triangle d’or
description:
Appartement dans triangle d’or features a balcony and is set in Marrakech, within just 1.8 km of Mouassine Museum and 1.4 km of Koutoubia Mosque. The property is situated 2 km from Yves Saint Laurent Museum, 2.8 km from Bahia Palace and 3.4 km from The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Djemaa El Fna is 1.7 km away.

Leading onto a terrace, this air-conditioned apartment comes with 2 separate bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Majorelle Gardens, Le Jardin Secret and Marrakesh Train Station. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3 km from Appartement dans triangle d’or.

name: La Fontaine
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Fontaine! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Featuring a spa bath, La Fontaine is located in Marrakech. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a lift for guests.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and garden views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a bath and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Guests at the apartment can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden.

Popular points of interest near La Fontaine include Djemaa El Fna, Majorelle Gardens and Mouassine Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Palais d'hôtes Darsor
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Palais d'hôtes Darsor! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Offering a barbecue and terrace, Darsor is set in Marrakech in the Marrakech-Safi Region, 800 metres from Stadium.

The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Enjoy a cup of coffee from your terrace or balcony. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower and bidet. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries. Darsor features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Grand Imilchil
description:
Hotel Le Grand Imilchil is located in Marrakech. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Private parking is available on site. Hotel Le Grand Imilchil features free WiFi throughout the property.

Every room has a flat-screen TV. Some rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units include views of the mountain or pool. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a bath.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire.

Palais de La Bahia is 1.6 km from Hotel Le Grand Imilchil. Marrakech-Menara Airport is 4 km from the property.

name: Résidence andalouse rue tarik ibn ziad
description:
Set in Marrakech, 1.8 km from Majorelle Gardens and 1.8 km from Djemaa El Fna, Résidence andalouse rue tarik ibn ziad offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.2 km from Marrakesh Train Station, 3 km from Bahia Palace and 3.2 km from The Orientalist Museum of Marrakech. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Mouassine Museum.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Le Jardin Secret, Koutoubia Mosque and Yves Saint Laurent Museum. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 4 km from Résidence andalouse rue tarik ibn ziad.

name: Appartement
description:
Appartement is situated in Marrakech, 1.9 km from Mouassine Museum, 1.5 km from Koutoubia Mosque, and 1.8 km from Yves Saint Laurent Museum. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.8 km from Majorelle Gardens, and guests can benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Djemaa El Fna.

The spacious apartment features a balcony, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with a fridge and a minibar. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Marrakesh Train Station is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Le Jardin Secret is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 4 km from Appartement.

name: Hotel Akabar
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Akabar! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
The Akabar sits in the residential area of L’Hivernage and is decorated in Moroccan style. It offers an outdoor pool surrounded by palm trees and air-conditioned rooms with balcony.

The famous Mohammed 5 Avenue, with its many shops, is just 500 metres away. There is also a kiosk in front of the Hotel Akabar selling tobacco, souvenirs and newspapers.

Akabar’s restaurant serves international and Moroccan cuisine in the elegant dining room with chandeliers. You can also have a drink at the bar or have a snack at the pool-side fast-food.

The rooms are all equipped with a TV, a telephone and a safe. They each have a private bathroom with a bathtub.

The Akabar Hotel staff speaks English, French and Spanish and will be happy to help you organise your stay. Front desk is open 24 hours and free Wi-Fi access is provided in public areas.

Local activities include golf, horseback riding and tennis. Hotel Akabar is just 2 km from Jamaâ El Fna Square and 7 km from Menara Airport. Parking within the limit of availability.

name: Hôtel & Ryads Barrière Le Naoura
description:
The Naoura Barrière is spread over a beautiful garden landscape, centrally located in Marrakesh near the heart of the medina. It offers a peaceful setting and luxury facilities.

The suites at Naoura Barrière are spacious with modern amenities and en suite facilities. Special touches include bathrobes, DVD players and a balcony.

The hotel restaurants offer quality local cuisine using fresh market produce.The hotel bar offers a relaxing space to sample an original cocktail and wine list. An extensive buffet breakfast is served each morning.

The spa includes a full range of relaxing treatments, two traditional Moroccan Hammams, and fitness centre. There is a club for children including activities and meals. Tours can be organized upon request.

The Naoura Barrière is ideally located near the airport and walking distance to many key attractions.

name: The Red House
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Red House! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Centrally located in the heart of the Hivernage district, this luxurious palace offers comfortable rooms and a warm atmosphere. It includes free Wi-Fi and free parking.

Rooms at The Red House are spacious and come fully equipped with modern comforts including TV, en suite facilities and air conditioning. The entire hotel has been elegantly decorated with traditional architecture.

The friendly and attentive staff will make your stay as comfortable as possible. A peaceful garden and swimming pool are ideal places to relax in at the end of the day.

Breakfast is served daily at The Red House and quality Moroccan cuisine is available in the hotel restaurant.  It is walking distance to the medina and local sites including Jamaâ El Fna Square.
